pages.text: Fire, an essential part to the survival of civilization.$(br2)There is no end to the number of uses fire can be used, so I must also have many ways to go about starting fires as well if I am to survive in any environment.

So far, I've found several useful ways to utilize fire: $(br2)(1) A quick, easy way to make a disposable fire starter $(thing)hand drill$() is with tinder and sticks. $(br2)(2) Placing tinder on the ground and filling it with logs makes for an easy campfire to cook with.$(br2)(3) And I can easily convert log piles to charcoal by pit burning.

By compacting wood logs into log piles and enclosing the piles on all sides, if I start to burn one pile and quickly seal it off, ash piles of charcoal will be formed after letting it burn for some time.
